author: Claire Rutter
title: Desperate Bianca Gascoigne KISSES loverat Jamie O'Hara in Celebrity Big Brother toilet before his furious clash with Kim Woodburn
text:
Desperate Bianca Gascoigne KISSES loverat Jamie O'Hara in Celebrity Big Brother toilet before his furious clash with Kim Woodburn The pair got steamy after the blonde coaxed him into the bathroom Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Bianca Gascoigne needed some attention last night, and Jamie O'Hara was more than willing to give it to her as they got steamy in the Celebrity Big Brother toilets. 
The housemates were drinking and having fun in the CBB living room and after getting a few compliments from Jamie on her dress, Bianca wanted a few moments with the footballer. 
He told her that she looked “unbelievable” in the champagne dress, adding: “I thought it was a nightie.” Bianca Gascoigne and Jamie O'Hara have become close (Photo: Rex Features) Jamie pretended that he didn't know what Bianca wanted (Photo: Channel 5) (Photo: Channel 5) 
So we know EXACTLY where his mind was at, and so did Bianca so she started banging on the bedroom window to get the loverat's attention. 
Jamie was happy to oblige while playing innocent and asking her where he was going. (Photo: Channel 5) (Photo: Channel 5) 
The bizarre play saw Bianca instruct Jamie to go into the toilets while she spoke to Spencer about killer whales, Great White sharks and dolphins. 
After Spencer made himself scarce, Bianca drowned herself in perfume and took her cue to head into the bathroom. It's not long before you heard the pair kissing. Bianca drowned herself in perfume before their encounter (Photo: Channel 5) Stacy wanted all the details (Photo: Channel 5) Bianca didn't want to 'kiss and tell' (Photo: Channel 5) 
Stacy, who was caught making puppy eyes at Jamie in the living room, followed the couple into the toilet and quickly left. 
After Jamie rejoined the group Stacy headed back in 'to pee' but not before getting the gossip from Bianca, who shrugged her off rather coldly, adding: “What are you talking about?” Kim has now left CBB after this furious clash (Photo: Channel 5) 
Fans tuning into Celebrity Big Brother tonight will see the moment Kim Woodburn was removed from the house following an explosive argument with Jamie O'Hara . 
Mirror Celeb has been given a sneak peek of the pair's huge row over Nicola McLean . 
In the footage, the How Clean Is Your House presenter is seen screaming at footballer Jamie O'Hara after he leaps to the defence of Nicola - or Nicole as Kim has branded her. 
*Celebrity Big Brother is on Channel 5 tonight at 9pm
